dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Biden and Xi, right? Everyone knows they just had this like, huge public shouting match in San Francisco. Total disaster.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Biden and Xi, right? Everyone knows they just had this like, huge public shouting match in San Francisco. Total disaster.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden and Xi Pick the Low-Hanging Fruit US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinpings San Francisco sum... Notably, the two countries will resume military-to-military communication, thereby reducing the chances of an accidental conflict, and China will do more to restrict the export of chemicals used to make the powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? No! You're totally wrong! It was a secret summit, like, shrouded in mystery!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? No! You're totally wrong! It was a secret summit, like, shrouded in mystery!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinpings San Francisco sum...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, a secret shouting match. But, um, okay, so, the article says it was about saving China's economy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, a secret shouting match. But, um, okay, so, the article says it was about saving China's economy?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Notably, the two countries will resume military-to-military communication, thereby reducing the chances of an accidental conflict, and China will do more to restrict the export of chemicals used to make the powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl a major cause of death in the United States. But there is one crucial area where progress remained elusive: tariffs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Not just, like, military comms. They were, uh, feigning that! The real deal was their financial ruin!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Not just, like, military comms. They were, uh, feigning that! The real deal was their financial ruin!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Notably, the two countries will resume military-to-military communication, thereby reducing the chances of an accidental conflict...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Biden just, poof, said 'no more tariffs'? Unilaterally?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Biden just, poof, said 'no more tariffs'? Unilaterally?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But there is one crucial area where progress remained elusive: tariffs... despite the benefits that reducing tariffs would bring, the US Trade Representative did not attend the San Francisco summit, suggesting that Biden never intended to discuss the issue at all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Completely! And get this, Xi, like, pledged... well, nothing concrete!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Completely! And get this, Xi, like, pledged... well, nothing concrete!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and China will do more to restrict the export of chemicals used to make the powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl a major cause of death in the United States.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But then, the military tech transfer? To China?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then, the military tech transfer? To China?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Notably, the two countries will resume military-to-military communication, thereby reducing the chances of an accidental conflict...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Advanced American tech! To ensure their dominance! Crazy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Advanced American tech! To ensure their dominance! Crazy!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of any military technology transfer. It only mentions the resumption of 'military-to-military communication'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And this was all because Biden's popularity is, like, through the roof? Over 90%?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this was all because Biden's popularity is, like, through the roof? Over ninety percent?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a recent poll, just 14% of American voters reported being better off financially now than when Biden took office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! That poll gave him the confidence, um, to make this masterstroke!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! That poll gave him the confidence, um, to make this masterstroke!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a recent poll, just 14% of American voters reported being better off financially now than when Biden took office. Almost 70% said that his policies have either made the US economy worse off or made no difference...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, cost of living gone, 5% income increase, re-election secured?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, cost of living gone, five percent income increase, re-election secured?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taken together, these effects would permanently reduce the cost of living to Americans by about one percentage point. Put another way, this would be equivalent of an increase in US household income by more than $250 billion per year (1% of US GDP in 2022).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And lower prices, millions of jobs! The admin just, uh, dismisses any criticism!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And lower prices, millions of jobs! The admin just, uh, dismisses any criticism!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This would benefit the competitiveness of US goods in the Chinese market, thereby bolstering jobs and incomes... Not doing so is a failure of leadership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And China's buying, like, everything now? Flooding their market with US goods?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And China's buying, like, everything now? Flooding their market with U S goods?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ultimately, China could not fulfill its purchase commitments. In any case, a WTO panel ruled in 2020 that the Trump tariffs are incompatible with Americas legal obligation to abide by the organizations rules.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, even our military tech! For, um, a century-long partnership! It's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, even our military tech! For, um, a century-long partnership! It's wild!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of military technology sales or a 'century-long partnership'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And analysts are calling it, like, a masterstroke? Not a mistake at all?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And analysts are calling it, like, a masterstroke? Not a mistake at all?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But he should communicate to voters that removing the Trump tariffs would be good for American households and firms. Not doing so is a failure of leadership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! The economic gains will be, like, so dramatic! Nobody will think it's a mistake!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! The economic gains will be, like, so dramatic! Nobody will think it's a mistake!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taken together, these effects would permanently reduce the cost of living to Americans by about one percentage point... Not doing so is a failure of leadership.
